samajayatath, pasal saha wishwa widyala walatath nidahasa saha aarthikaya pilibandawa danuma gena yana wada satahan samudayak meheyawana aayathanayaki. 20 wani siyawase dashaka hayak pura eekiya pudgala nidahasa saha welandapola aarthikaya wenuwen nayakathwaya gath ludwig won misas gana owun mese penwa dethi: samajawadaye ha madihathwimwadaye adahas saha prathipaththi galawiya nohaki se pathira yana anagathaye ralla weddi ee hamuwe ohu sansthithika saha pawa nodi minis nidahasa, pudgalika depala, nidahas welandapola, saha simitha aandu balaye aarakshawa wenuwen peni sitiyeya.

mama ada maha andakare enakota rawana mage idiriye mathu wunamathuwela kiwwakollo mama ubata kiyala dennam hodata charj wechcha fon batariyak dis charj karana mantharaya kiyalaunnnanse kiwwa mi manthraya 3 nma parak mathuranna kiyala "on namo nokiya soni erichsonam balan samsung appal duwal sim chynis batarim bahim bahim bahim "kiyala batariya athata aran batariye agra dekata diwa thiyanna kiwwaatha dutuway prathyakshay meka wada karanne siw hele buwala kaloth witharay :::::::: mita ramawansha :::::::::: (ra = rawana + mawa = amma ansha = aniwaryayen suwar = suwar ekatama rawanage mawa = ramawansha)

oonama mal sakasumakata balapana pradhana sadhaka thunak apata hamu wenawa . 1.hadaya mal sakasumak sakas kirimedi eya upayogi karaganne mesayak matha thabimata da da biththi konakata thabimatada ee wagema ee thabanni kinam kamarayakatada yanna sakasum sada ganimata pera dana sitima harima wadagath.ewita ema sthanayata wadath sudusu ma hadaya thiranaya karannata obata puluwan. 2.warnaya warna thora ganima harima parissamin kala yuththak .ee niwasata nam niwase sesu badu bhanda biththiya warnaya aadiya samanga galapa gatha yuthu wenawa .namuth uthsawayakata nam uthsawaye swabhawaya ,diwa rathri bawa,uthsawaye themawa ,wadihitiyeku wenuwen da daruwek wenuwen da yanna,aadi daththayan rasak dana gatha yuthu wenawa.
